lead_paragraph: PLAYER In Spain, Sergio Aguero, Atletico Madrid’s 20-year-old Argentine striker, scored two goals Saturday in a 4-2 victory against Barcelona. The defeat ended Barcelona’s eight-game unbeaten streak in La Liga and left it 5 points behind league-leading Real Madrid. Aguero, who is nicknamed Kun, after a Japanese comic book character, has 11 goals this season.
